qas.question: How many Freemasons are believed to have been killed under Hitler's Nazi Regime?
What kind of prisioner was a Freemason considered to be?
What identifier did the Nazis make the Freemason prisioners wear?
Who was responsible for creating antisemetic and anti-masonic propaganda?
Where is most of the informaton about Freemasons persecuted in the Holocaust located?

answers.text: The preserved records of the Reichssicherheitshauptamt (the Reich Security Main Office)

qas.question: What is the Relch Security Main Office also called?
Who was responsible for ideological tasks of the written records?
How many Freemasons were killed under the Nazi regime?
What did Masonic concentration camp inmates have to wear?
How many Freemasons are believed to have been resurrected under Hitler's Nazi Regime?
What kind of deity was a Freemason considered to be?
What identifier did the Nazis make the Freemason prisoners conceal?
What is the Reich Security Main Office required to be called?
Who was responsible for geography tasks of the verbal records?

context: <a4_0>The preserved records of the <a5_0><b12_0>Reichssicherheitshauptamt<b12_0/><a5_0/> (the Reich Security Main Office)<a4_0/> show the persecution of Freemasons during the Holocaust. RSHA Amt VII (Written Records) was overseen by <a3_0><a6_0><b13_0>Professor Franz Six<b13_0/><a6_0/><a3_0/> and was responsible for "ideological" tasks, by which was meant the creation of antisemitic and anti-Masonic propaganda. While the number is not accurately known, it is estimated that <a0_0><a7_0><b9_0>between 80,000 and 200,000<b9_0/><a7_0/><a0_0/> Freemasons were killed under the Nazi regime. Masonic concentration camp inmates were graded as <a1_0><b10_0>political prisoners<b10_0/><a1_0/> and wore <a8_0>an <a2_0><b11_0>inverted red triangle<b11_0/><a2_0/>.
